Strategic Vision

CINAS consolidates a translational research initiative situated at the convergence of Advanced Computer Science and Radiation Sciences.

In a global scenario where digital transformation redefines scientific paradigms, we operate under the premise that the next frontier of nuclear and medical innovation will come from the intelligence extracted from data.

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
Expanding Frontiers: We are currently expanding our activities to incorporate Physics-Informed Machine Learning (PIML), actively seeking academic partners to consolidate this new methodology at IPEN.
:::
